Summary: TYPE CONSTANT FUNCTION
fgl

fglcdvAuthBio

Genero BDL wrapper around the Cordova Fingerprint plugin.

TYPE Summary
AuthOptionsT RECORD
The AuthOptionsT type is used to pass options to the authenticate call.

CONSTANT Summary
AUTH_TYPE_FACE STRING
AUTH_TYPE_FINGER STRING
AUTH_TYPE_NONE STRING

FUNCTION Summary

Checks if the user passed the authentication check

getLastError() RETURNS STRING
Returns the last Error message of the previous operation
isAvaible() RETURNS BOOLEAN

Types

AuthOptionsT

TYPE AuthOptionsT RECORD
    
clientId STRING
clientSecret STRING
disableBackup BOOLEAN
localizedFallbackTitle STRING
END RECORD

The AuthOptionsT type is used to pass options to the authenticate call.

Constants

AUTH_TYPE_FACE

CONSTANT AUTH_TYPE_FACE STRING = "face"

AUTH_TYPE_FINGER

CONSTANT AUTH_TYPE_FINGER STRING = "finger"

AUTH_TYPE_NONE

CONSTANT AUTH_TYPE_NONE STRING = "none"

Functions

authenticate

FUNCTION authenticate(options AuthOptionsT) RETURNS BOOLEAN

Checks if the user passed the authentication check

In case the auhentication failed, the error can be retrieved with getLastError()

Parameters:
options -
Returns:
TRUE in case the user was able to authenticate , otherwise FALSE

availableType

FUNCTION availableType() RETURNS STRING

Retrieves the biometric authentication type avaiable on the device

Returns:
either AUTH_TYPE_NONE,AUTH_TYPE_FINGER or AUTH_TYPE_FACE

getLastError

FUNCTION getLastError() RETURNS STRING

Returns the last Error message of the previous operation

Returns:
the error message

isAvaible

FUNCTION isAvaible() RETURNS BOOLEAN

Retrieves if biometric authentication is possible

Returns:
TRUE in case a biometric authentication method is possible otherwise FALSE
